name: Ore no Animism: Heaven Chapter
summary: Sequel to Ore no Animism, now using Danmakufu ph3. Features strange gameplay based around purchasing upgrades and bombs in real time. Significantly easier than the first game, and introduces a full set of four difficulties. Also introduces two more player characters, originally bosses from the previous game. Boss special attacks are called "Works" here. Contains ten boss Works for the ten new characters, but these must be unlocked by completing certain tasks.
